feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report referencing updates to Pride Moments content and related files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summaries of various frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base, components, and utilities imports.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all site routes and wraps them in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/branding/UtthanL: Logo component rendering the clinic SVG logo.
frontend/src/components/contact/GoogleMa: Embeds Google Maps iframe showing the clinic location.
frontend/src/components/cta/BookAppointm: Button linking to Calendly with icon and secondary styling.
Reusable email button generating a mailto link using clinic info.
frontend/src/components/cta/MobileSticky: Mobile-only sticky booking button linking to Calendly.
frontend/src/components/home/PrideMoment: Image carousel with navigation, keyboard support, and slide indicators.
Section displaying Pride Moments content with cards and carousels.
frontend/src/components/home/WhoWeAreSec: Home section describing the clinic with image, text, and CTA.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with clinic info, quick links, services list, and social link.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, mobile menu toggle, and appointment button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Overall page layout rendering header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Updates document title, meta description, and optional JSON‑LD on mount/unmount.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Service preview card showing image, icon, summary, benefits, and link to service details with fallback image handling.
Maps service IDs to lucide icons and renders the corresponding icon.
frontend/src/content/clinicContent.ts: Static content describing clinic hero, about, values, mission, and reasons to choose the clinic.
frontend/src/content/conditions.ts: Defines condition type and a list of common conditions with symptoms and treatments.
frontend/src/content/faq.ts: FAQ entries with questions and answers for clinic visitors.
frontend/src/content/prideMoments.ts: Static data for clinic pride‑moment events including images and descriptions.
frontend/src/content/reviews.ts: Review data, Google aggregate rating constants, and helper functions for average and count.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines a Service interface and exports a list of physiotherapy service objects with descriptions, benefits, target audiences, and image metadata.
frontend/src/content/therapists.ts: Defines a Therapist interface and exports an array of therapist profiles with qualifications, specialties, experience, and bio details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity, invalidating queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook using DFINITY AuthClient to manage login state, identity loading, and logout.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines custom color variables, dark-mode tokens, utility classes, animations, and branding filters.
frontend/src/lib/clinicInfo.ts: Exports static clinic information and helper functions for formatting the address and generating a phone link.
frontend/src/lib/seoSchema.ts: Generates JSON‑LD schema objects for the clinic, services, FAQs, and reviews using clinic metadata and content.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero content, story section, mission and vision cards, and SEO metadata integration.
frontend/src/pages/ConditionsPage.tsx: Displays a list of treatable conditions with symptoms and treatments using cards and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact details including phone, email, address, and map embed with styled cards and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Renders FAQ items in an accordion layout with SEO and JSON-LD schema.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage featuring hero content, trust badges, service highlights, and various clinic sections with SEO schema.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a single service including hero, image, benefits, and SEO schema; handles missing services.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of all services with a hero section and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Lists patient reviews in card layout with hero, SEO metadata, and link to Google reviews.
frontend/src/pages/TherapistsPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme settings, custom colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and includes typography, container-queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, feature requests, and known issues, focusing on fixing and enhancing the Pride Moments carousel with multiple user-uploaded images.
